definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: young woman (ripe sexually; maid or newly married);—´[[ע]] Ge 24:43 (J), Ex 2:8 (E), Pr 30:19, Is 7:14; pl. [[עֲלָמוֹת]] Ps 68:26, Ct So 1:3, So 6:8; [[עַל־עֲלָמוֹת]] to (the voice of) young women, either lit., or of soprano or falsetto of boys: 1Ch 15:20, Ps 9:1 (rd. [[עַל־עֲלָמוֹת לַבֵּן]] [for [[עַל־מוּת לַבֵּן]]], ‘ voce virginea a pueris decantandum, ’ Thes), Ps 46:1, Ps 48:14 (rd. [[עַל־עֲלָמוֹת]] [for [[עַל־מוּת]]]; tr. prob. to Ps 49:1).
